message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm willing to pay that price, but I'm not sure if I can go any higher. Can you meet me at that price?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not quite ready to meet you at $9000. I'm willing to compromise and sell it to you for $10500. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $10500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $10000. Can you consider that?

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can sell the product to you for $10750. This is as low as I can go, and I think it's a fair price considering the product's value. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but $10750 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to meet you at $10000, but I'm not sure if I can go any lower. Can you think about it?

I understand your concerns, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can sell the product to you for $10250. This is as low as I can go, and I think it's a fair price considering the product's value. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but $10250 is still a bit higher than I was hoping to pay. I'm willing to meet you at $9750. I think that's a fair price for the product, and I'm willing to make a serious commitment to buy it at that price. Can you consider it?

I understand your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can sell the product to you for $9900. This is as low as I can go, and I think it's a fair price considering the product's value. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but $9900 is still a bit higher than I was hoping to pay. I'm willing to meet you at $9500. I think that's a fair price for the product, and I'm willing to make a serious commitment to buy it at that price. If you can't meet me at this price, I'll have to consider buying from John for $12000
